Interface AuthService

    Interface for user registration and authorization

    • Method Detail

      • signin

        java.lang.String signin​(SignInDto signInDto)
                 throws JwtTokenException,
                        ResourceException
        Method for user authorization
        Parameters:
        signInDto - Dto class
        Returns:
        JWT in string format
        Throws:
        JwtTokenException - Throws an exception if the JWT contains incorrect user information, or if the JWT has expired
        ResourceException - Throws an exception that is associated with a resource. e.g. the resource is not found, the resource already exists, etc.
        See Also:
        JwtTokenProvider, SignInDto

      • signup

        java.lang.String signup​(SignUpDto signUpDto)
                 throws ResourceException
        Method for user registration
        Parameters:
        signUpDto - Dto class
        Returns:
        JWT in string format
        Throws:
        ResourceException - Throws an exception that is associated with a resource. e.g. the resource is not found, the resource already exists, etc.
        See Also:
        JwtTokenProvider, SignUpDto
